DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see new Smart Phone application help Veterans manage panic symptom complete two-day treatment panic attack .
DOC.brief_title: Using Smart Phone Technology To Rural Veterans
DOC.detailed_description: The first goal see helpful Smart Phone application help veteran panic symptom continue improve complete treatment . The second goal study find much veteran like Smart Phone application . The third goal see practical use Smart Phone application form follow-up care . We want see much time need provide technical support use application .
DOC.criteria: Participants must 1. Operation Enduring Freedom/Operation Iraqi Freedom/Operation New Dawn ( OEF/OIF/OND ) Veteran 2. currently meet criterion PD without Agoraphobia 3. complete weekend PD treatment Lufkin , Conroe Texas City CBOC . 1. current substance dependence 2. organic psychosis 3. symptomatic bipolar disorder 4. severe depression suicidal intent plan 5. cognitive impairment ( indicated score < 20 SLUMS )
